unnormalised: Okay, mhonnlle konnem maka Maths equations khatir LaTeX vapronche vixim vicharlem, khas korun CBSE class 10 khatir. TBH, tem poileak bhiranticho disota, punn tem purnnponnan molachem! Tum quadratic equations ani kotthin formulas khub spastaen ani professional ritin boroita ieta. Fokot sadea text-an exponents sangpacho prayatn korchea bodlek, tum `x^2 + bx + c = 0` oxem korum ieta. Khub borem, kiteak nhoi? Plus, tum uchelea classes-ak dhyey dovortat zalear, khas korun tum Class 11 ani 12-ant Maths korpacho vichar kortat zalear, LaTeX zannop ek vhoddlem plus.
normalised: Borem, konnem tor Maths che equations khatir L-A-T-E-X vaprunk sodhtam mhunn mhojek sodlem, khas korun C-B-S-E class dha khatir. T-B-H, suruvatint tem bhayankor dista, punn tem purnnponnan layak asa! Tum quadratic equations ani kathinn formulas khub spaxtt ani vyavasayik ritin boroounk sakta. Fokot sadhya text-an exponents somzhaunk prayatn korchea bodla, tum x squared plus b x plus c barabor zero kitem tori korun sakta. Khub bore, kiteak nhoi? Plus, tum uchelea classes khatir dhyey dovortat, khas korun tum Class elevent ani twelvent Maths korunk chinttai, L-A-T-E-X zannap ek vhoddlem plus asa.

unnormalised: Gadann mhonnllear, survat korop Mt. Everest choddlea bhaxen disonk xakta. Tuka ek LaTeX editor zai poddtolo â€“ Overleaf khub famous asa kiteak tem online ani collaborative asa. Tum TeXstudio-chi local installation vaprum ieta. Fokot LaTeX syntax vaprun equations type kor ani tem tuka ek sundor output generate kortolem. Textbooks-an dista tea complex trigonometry formulas-acho vichar kor, zoxem `sin^2(theta) + cos^2(theta) = 1`. Tum tem sahajikponnan recreate korum ieta. Even kotthin integration symbols (\int) ani fractions (\frac{a}{b}) ponn possible asat.
normalised: Kitem mhonnlear, suruvat korop Mount Everest choddlea bhaxen dista. Tuka ek L-A-T-E-X editor zai poddtolo - Overleaf khub prasiddh asa kiteak tem online ani sahkaryachem asa. Tum TeXstudio cholem local installation vaprunk sakta. L-A-T-E-X syntax vaprun equations type kor ani tem tuka ek sundor output utponn kortolem. Textbooks-an distat te kathinn trigonometry formulas chint, zoxe sine squared of theta plus cosine squared of theta barabor ek. Tum tem sopeponnan punha tayar korun sakta. Kathinn integral symbols ani fractions a divided by b dakhounkui shakya asa.

unnormalised: StackExchange vo specific LaTeX commands khatir YouTube tutorials asleo online tons of resources asat. Tum turotuch sarkem korun gheunk na zalear dolldhorye bhaxen bhogunk naka. Exponents, subscripts (`a_i`), ani fractions sarkhea basic cheezamni survat kor ani magir dhire dhire kotthin symbols ani structures-ak voch. Practice mhonnllear KEY. Tumchea NCERT textbook-antle kaim equations recreate korpacho prayatn kor, page 45 zaitea povitran? Tem tuka ek borem feel ditolem.
normalised: Online-an khub resources asat, zoxem StackExchange-cher vo nirall L-A-T-E-X commands khatir YouTube tutorials-ui asat. Tunvem tem tankalik mellonam mhunn udvegit zaunk naka. Exponents, subscripts a sub i, ani fractions bhaxen mullavim vostunche suruvat kor ani magir thodyach dhirean odik kathinn symbols ani structures-ak voch. Sova korop K-E-Y asa. Tumchea N-C-E-R-T textbook, page forty five-thavn kaim equations punha tayar korunk prayatn kor? Tem tuka tachi bori bhavna ditolem.

unnormalised: Nimannek, LaTeX xikop ek skill asa je tumka fokot class 10 exams-am poros kitench boreponn ditolem. Tem academic papers, research documents, ani basically koslea-i zagear vaporta zaka tumka complex mathematical equations ek spast ani unambiguous ritin borovpachi goroz asa. Mhonnun ek shot di! Tem poileak kotthin disonk xakta, punn tum `E=mc^2` sarkhea sundor equations tornnach velar boroitle! Good luck, bhai!
normalised: Nimannem, L-A-T-E-X shikon ghevop ek kushaltai asa ji tuka class dha poriksha thavn khub fuddleak labh ditoli. Tem academic papers, research documents ani mullponnan koxi tum spaxtt ani asaambhavit ritin kathinn ganitik equations boroounk zai poddta tea koidench-i vaprunk yetat. Mhonnun ek shot di! Tem suruvatint kathinn disunk xakta, punn tum E barabor m c squared sarkhe sundor equations torank bore korun boroitole! Shubhechha, bhai!
